digest:
- *AlomWare Toolbox* offers innovative automation and window management features for Windows users, enhancing productivity. Learn more at https://www.alomware.com
- *Weekly Dose of Optimism #168* explores cutting-edge developments in chip technology, geothermal energy, AI biodefense, and affordable home robotics. Dive deeper at https://www.notboring.co/p/weekly-dose-of-optimism-168
